name: iPhone 12
description: The iPhone 12 features a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, 5G connectivity, A14 Bionic chip, dual-camera system, and iOS 14.

name: Galaxy S21
description: The Galaxy S21 features a 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, 5G connectivity, Exynos 2100 chip, triple-camera system, and Android 11.

name: Pixel 5
description: The Pixel 5 features a 6.0-inch OLED display, 5G connectivity, Snapdragon 765G chip, dual-camera system, and Android 11.

name: OnePlus 9 Pro
description: The OnePlus 9 Pro features a 6.7-inch Fluid AMOLED display, 5G connectivity, Snapdragon 888 chip, quad-camera system, and Android 11.

name: iPhone 13
description: The iPhone 13 features a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, 5G connectivity, A15 Bionic chip, dual-camera system, and iOS 15.

name: OnePlus 10
description: The OnePlus 10 features a 6.7-inch Fluid AMOLED display, 5G connectivity, Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 chipset, quad-camera system, and OxygenOS 12 based on Android 13.

name: Lenovo IdeaPad 5
description: The Lenovo IdeaPad 5 is a great all-around Laptops that offers solid performance and a comfortable keyboard at an affordable price.

name: Dell Inspiron 15
description: The Dell Inspiron 15 is a budget-friendly Laptops that offers decent performance for everyday tasks and a large 15.6-inch display.

name: Acer Aspire 5
description: The Acer Aspire 5 is a solid mid-range Laptops that offers good performance and a comfortable keyboard, making it a great choice for students and professionals.

name: Apple MacBook Air
description: The Apple MacBook Air is a lightweight and portable Laptops that offers excellent battery life and a stunning Retina display, making it a great choice for students and professionals on the go.

name: Asus ZenBook 14
description: The Asus ZenBook 14 is a slim and stylish Laptops that offers good performance and a comfortable keyboard, making it a great choice for productivity and entertainment.

name: Dell XPS 13
description: The Dell XPS 13 features a 13.3-inch Full HD InfinityEdge display, 11th Generation Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB of RAM, 512GB SSD storage, Intel Iris Xe graphics, and Windows 10 Home.

name: Lenovo USB-C Hub
description: The Lenovo USB-C Hub is a convenient accessory that expands the connectivity options of your laptop with additional USB and HDMI ports.

name: Logitech M720 Mouse
description: The Logitech M720 Triathlon Mouse is a versatile wireless mouse that can connect to up to three devices and offers long battery life.

name: Jabra Speak 710
description: The Jabra Speak 710 Speakerphone is a high-quality conference speakerphone that offers great sound quality and convenient connectivity options.

name: Samsung SSD
description: The Samsung T5 Portable SSD is a fast and compact external drive that offers reliable and secure storage for your files.

name: Anker 10000
description: The Anker PowerCore 10000 Portable Charger is a compact and high-capacity power bank that can charge your devices on the go.

name: Logitech HD Webcam
description: The Logitech C920s HD Pro Webcam is a high-quality webcam that offers clear and sharp video and audio for your online meetings and conferences.

description: This Calvin Klein slim-fit dress shirt is made from high-quality cotton and features a modern, sophisticated design.
